name: tolyui
description: A responsive ui library for Flutter. Help developer build app easier.

children.name: tolyui_color
children.description: Part of Toly UI: display or change color in many style.

children.name: tolyui_navigation
children.description: Part of Toly UI: Navigation UI Widget Lib. Contains breadcrumb、drop_menu、rail_menu_tree、tabs etc...

children.name: tolyui_feedback
children.description: A feedback ui package for toly ui. Contains message、popover、tooltip etc...

children.name: tolyui_message
children.description: Part of Toly UI: Toast Message and Notification in Global of App
